creator: david@switch.be
text:

D_REENTRANT   -I../../include -I../../include/arch/unix  -c apr_pools.c && 
touch apr_pools.lo

*** Error code 1

gcc version :

from sunfreeware.com

configure line used : 
./configure --prefix=/apps/apache2 --enable-ssl --enable-dav --enable-info

creator: jerenkrantz@apache.org
text:
Have you tried applying the latest Sun recommended patches?

This works here on Solaris 8 with gcc 2.95.3 with the latest patches.
There have been various reports of breakage with non-patched systems.

Thanks for using Apache!

this is a clean installed system with the latest recommanded patchcluster from 
sun on it

i can provide a full showrev -p if you want
creator: david@switch.be
jerenkrantz@apache.org
text:
This seems to be a asm/ld/binutils problem.  Are you using Solaris's binutils or
the GNU binutils?

There was an issue that GNU binutils was not working on Solaris (fixed in CVS,
FWIW).  That may help out if you are using GNU binutils.

With Sun's binutils:

justin@nagoya% /usr/ccs/bin/make 
cat
/disk/raid0/home/justin/cvs-apache/httpd-2.0/srclib/apr/atomic/solaris_sparc/apr_atomic_sparc.s
> apr_atomic_sparc.S
as -K pic -P -D_ASM -D__STDC__=0 -xarch=v8plus -o apr_atomic_sparc.lo
apr_atomic_sparc.S
justin@nagoya%

Since your output doesn't seem to be using as, I think you are seeing the
GNU binutils problem.  Please trying a nightly tarball or CVS and see if
that helps.

creator: jwoolley@apache.org
text: *** Bug 8038 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

There have been some additional fixes made to HEAD today to further resolve this.

Please try the latest CVS snapshot or wait for the next release.

I am marking this as a duplicate of 8214 where Jim added his notes so we can
coordinate this problem under one PR.

Thanks for using Apache!

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 8214 ***
creator: jerenkrantz@apache.org
